item.title: X Lovers - LOVE (Feat.Young K)
item.description:
시선이 맞닿을 때면
미소와 함께 행복해져
너와 있는
시간
내가 나로 있을 수 있어
그때만
Your style oh
like the king of Rome
Oh you take my heart
like something you own
‘Cause I
I’ll follow you
Blind
I’ll follow you
Time and time
until you’re mine
Oh baby
be my love
Oh baby ‘cause
you’re all I want
Oh baby
be my love today
And forever
and ever ayee
Oh baby
be my love
Oh baby ‘cause
you’re all I want
Oh baby
be my love today
And forever
and ever ayee
You smile oh when you
see me lookin’
And I know just what
you’ve been cookin’
‘Cause I see
in your eyes
See
in the temporary
Disguise
you’re wearing
세상의 이 모든 게
다 니 손에 잡히는 게
좋아 싫지 않아
I’ll follow you
Time and time
until you’re mine
Oh baby
be my love
Oh baby ‘cause
you’re all I want
Oh baby
be my love today
And forever
and ever ayee
Oh baby
be my love
Oh baby ‘cause
you’re all I want
Oh baby
be my love today
And forever
and ever ayee
You came over
and fell asleep
For what seemed
like eternity
You came over
and fell asleep
Well I could do better
but I’m in deep so
Oh baby
be my love
Oh baby ‘cause
you’re all I want
Oh baby
be my love today
And forever
and ever ayee

be my love

you’re all I want
